Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 465 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

beer.beer_description:
WEST COAST IPA 6.7% (LIMITED RELEASE)

Big, bold, resinous are the first words coming to mind, quickly followed by big malt richness & a huge hop hit. Coupled with just enough bitterness at the back end to balance.

A beautifully cleaer, deep-golden-straw appearance strikes the eyes, but a big punchy West Coast likes in wait for the unsuspecting drinker... snap!

You will need another sip to get the nuanced flavours offered by the unique hop combina- tion... piney-resinous goodness, followed by tropical and stone fruits, finishing with a hint of citrus peel and a faint smokiness.... intriguing!

Hops: Warrior, Cascade, Chinook (hot side), Nelson, Citra, Strata (cold side)

Right about now youre feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you cant get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 290 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 59.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 320 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 65. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly whats on tap! That's 405 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 82!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 435 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 88!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 200 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 41! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 145 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 30! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

beer.beer_description:
This is your everyday knock off lager.
Sensationally light and easy drinking with low bitterness, a crispy dry finish thanks to the flaked rice and high carbonation. A beer to deliver something that will satisfy a hard-earned-thirst anyday. Perfect for our weather, and did we mention its low carb to boot?
Win-Win!

items.badge_description: After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, arent you?. Thats 265 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 54!

This is your everyday knock off lager.
Sensationally light and easy drinking with low bitterness, a crispy dry finish thanks to the flaked rice and high carbonation. A beer to deliver something that will satisfy a hard-earned-thirst anyday. Perfect for our weather, and did we mention its low carb to boot?

A lighter take on the Rauchbier style. Using only 2% smoked malt on the grain bill, this gently smoked brew will quench your thirst on a hot Aussie day.
Light straw yellow, mid strength lager. German noble hops
